long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Import Reviews - Sales Triggers is designed to collect reviews from AliExpress product pages.

Get your social proof with AliExpress Review Importer. 
This review can provide detailed information about the product from the consumer's perspective, helping users determine the reputation and quality of the product before making a purchase.
